title: White Knight

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You may choose to make yourself a centaur. You must pick one other player, and they get dealt a powerful attack. If they die, you lose this ability. If not, you keep it.
- Once you have successfully attacked someone, You may choose to transport two players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Your targets have a 10% chance of engaging a transfur.

desc:
Post 2889
"From what I've seen, These things like to absorb their prey entirely, making themselves a sort of centaur of sorts." -Dr.█████, MIT.
